DugnadNett.Description: A bachelor thesis project built in a team, where I led development. DugnadNett is a platform for organizing local volunteer work, with real-time communication, event filtering, and a shared event dashboard.

GitFrost.Description: A UI/UX concept for a Git platform that prioritizes flow and simplicity.

Lisenskode.Description: A online store built from scratch to explore Vipps integration. The solution features SMTP email delivery of license codes, an admin system, and seamless functionality throughout.

DugnadNett.Title: DugnadNett
DugnadNett.Subtitle: Bachelor Project
DugnadNett.Description: This project developed a digital platform to organize volunteer work, with real-time communication, filtering, and a central overview of local volunteer activities.
DugnadNett.Statement: How can a web application improve volunteer organization by overcoming the limitations of social media?
DugnadNett.Reflection: Through the project, I have developed a deeper understanding of coding and team communication, especially how to effectively discuss and provide feedback on code. I have learned to express technical solutions clearly and receive constructive criticism, which has been crucial in improving code quality and collaboration between team members.

RealTime.Title: Real-time Chat
RealTime.Description: Socket.IO powered group chats enabling instant communication between participants

Maps.Title: Location Integration
Maps.Description: Google Maps API integration for visual representation of dugnad locations

Filtering.Title: Smart Filtering
Filtering.Description: URL-based state management for advanced filtering and sorting capabilities

Auth.Title: Secure Authentication
Auth.Description: Robust authentication system using Auth.js for user management

Moderation.Title: Moderation Tools
Moderation.Description: Comprehensive controls for dugnad owners to manage participants and content

Content.Title: Rich Content
Content.Description: Markdown support and image uploads to Backblaze B2 for detailed dugnad descriptions

Lisenskode.Title: Lisenskode
Lisenskode.Subtitle: Vipps Checkout Integration
Lisenskode.Description: A online store developed from scratch to explore Vipps Checkout integration. The solution includes SMTP email sending of license codes, an administration system, and seamless interaction between all functions.
Lisenskode.AdditionalInfo: This project was a great opportunity to test real-world e-commerce workflows, focusing on secure payments, privacy compliance, and efficient admin tools.

Email.Title: Nodemailer SMTP Sender
Email.Description: Automated license code delivery via email using Nodemailer.

Payment.Title: Vipps Checkout Integration
Payment.Description: Seamless payment processing with Vipps Checkout.

Compliance.Title: Compliance
Compliance.Description: Adheres to privacy (personvern) and sales terms (salgsbetingelser).

Admin.Title: Admin Dashboard with CRUD
Admin.Description: Full-featured admin panel for managing content and licenses.

Deployment.Title: Continuous Deployment
Deployment.Description: Streamlined updates with automated deployment pipelines.

RichContent.Title: Rich Content
RichContent.Description: Markdown support for product descriptions and activation guides.
